name: United Me
description:
Controls:
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
R - Restart Level
Q - Open Menu
Space - Jump

This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam with the theme "Stronger Together". The idea was to create an introspective game about working with "other versions" of yourself to solve puzzles where a single self is not enough. With more time I would have liked to add more of these story elements and better puzzles but experimenting with mechanics got the better of me. There are only two worlds currently as the planned third one didn't make it in time. Thanks for playing!
